> <OLD>
>
> Hydras hissed and said "Play along... for now"

<NEW>

JHIAXUS nodded, a frown on his face but brings the ship around and
even with the COMBATRONS.

The outer airlock handle spins and then the door opened to allow the
four figures to step in.

BB is first, a large hulking COMBATRON to enter and looked around, he
was nearly the size of SCORPONOK!  "Roger roger!" BB said as he
oriented his cannons on SCORPONOK and HYDRAS!

Then the blue on blue figure of DIRGEGUN and the yellow form of
THRUSTOR entered, their weapons also carefully aimed about the room.

"Who are you?" Came the unmistakable voice of HELLSCREAM, the apparent
leader of this group. "I recognize Scorponok and Jhiaxus." He turned
to look at HYDRAS, "But you, you I don't know."

(TAG)

- Preston
